Metadata: Recovery of low concentration proteins by chitosan- polyanion complexes: application to wastewater treatments
Proceedings of the Eighth International Congress on Engineering and Food, ICEF 8, pp. 1925-1929

The objectives of this research were (1) to evaluate the efficiency of chitosan-​polyanion complexes to recover suspended solids in surimi wastewater and cheddar cheese whey as affected by the polyanion used, monomeric weight ratios, concentration in whey, and treatment time; and, (2) to investigate coagulation mechanisms using ultraviolet/vis​ible spectroscopy and analysis of coagulated solids.
